summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing a grant agreement with the Urban Park and Recreation Recovery Program (UPARR) of the United States Department of Interior, National Parks Service for funding to support improvements at Pratt Park; and increasing the 2002 budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation by making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund-Unrestricted Subaccount; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
